x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement:
Developers are facing biggest challenge in convert UI Actions that are displayed both in Native UI and Workspace..
Where they will write 2 separate client scripts one specific to Desktop view and one specific to Workspace view..
Note: Workspace Client scripting is having a different format altogether and can be very challenging at times...
This is very time consuming and complex to perform.
So if ServiceNow can come up with a AI feature or Code intelligence feature , that can analyze the Desktop view related Client script in a UI Action and generate a suggestion of Workspace Client script ...
